properties.title: The Lapies
properties.abstract: The lapies were formed by dripping raindrops over the years and confer an almost lunar look to the region.
properties.description: This spectacular group of lapies, which can be found between Pierre du Moëllé and Tour de Famelon, will enchant all fans of speleology and lovers of nature.  The landscape above it is just as impressive: the limestone rocks are covered by ridges and resemble the ruins of an ancient town.
properties.name: Office du Tourisme Les Mosses
